Test Instructions

  • Hover Test: Hover over each social icon to see platform-specific colors
  • Keyboard Test: Use Tab key to navigate, arrow keys to move between icons
  • Click Test: Click icons to test links (real links will open social media)
  • Mobile Test: Resize browser window to < 640px to see mobile behavior
  • Accessibility: Test with screen reader for proper announcements
  • Touch Test: On touch devices, test tap interactions

Expected Behaviors:

  • Instagram: Pink gradient on hover
  • Facebook: Blue background on hover
  • WhatsApp: Green background on hover
  • Email: Gold background on hover
  • Tooltips appear on hover (desktop only)
  • "Follow us" text hidden on mobile
  • Smooth animations and transitions
